Actions.Text: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT
REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

Title: Creates the New York City department of housing preservation and development homeowners improvement trust fund and the HPD homeowner standard warranty
Summary: Creates the New York City department of housing preservation and development homeowners improvement trust fund and the HPD homeowner standard warranty.
LawCode: Add Art 28 §§1233 - 1238, Priv Hous Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the private housing finance law, in relation to creating the New York City department of housing preservation and development homeowners improvement trust fund and the HPD homeowner standard warranty
